sections.heading: Third-party components
paragraphs: Color Picker is built on open-source technologies. We acknowledge and respect the licenses of each library we rely on.
bullets: Jetpack Compose Material 3 for UI components
Navigation Compose and Accompanist Navigation Animation for in-app navigation

sections.heading: License notes
paragraphs: All third-party libraries remain the property of their respective owners. Their original licenses are preserved and credited here so you can review them in detail.
